enabled.description: Enable or disable this channel for this bot

useTestingApi.description:
Use Vonage sandbox to test the Messages API.
Testing endpoint is: https://messages-sandbox.nexmo.com/v0.1/messages.
Production endpoint is: https://api.nexmo.com/v0.1/messages.

apiKey.description: The Vonage API key which you can obtain from your Dashboard. (https://dashboard.nexmo.com/settings).

apiSecret.description: The Vonage API secret which you can obtain from your Dashboard. (https://dashboard.nexmo.com/settings).

signatureSecret.description: The Vonage API signature secret which you can obtain from your Dashboard. (https://dashboard.nexmo.com/settings).

applicationId.description: The Vonage Application ID for your Vonage Application which can be obtained from your Dashboard. (https://dashboard.nexmo.com/applications).

privateKey.description:
The content of the private.key file that was generated when you created your Vonage Application. (https://dashboard.nexmo.com/applications).
_Note: You must replace all line breaks with the character `\n`_.

botPhoneNumber.description:
The phone number linked with your Vonage Application. (https://dashboard.nexmo.com/applications).
_Note: Make sure to omit the '+'. E.g. +1 456 123 4567 should be: 14561234567_
